title: "igenius" amorphous typeface
content:
Dear all

Does anyone know the name of this font?

Many thanks

Gareth

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [genius.gif](http://web.archive.org/system/files?file=genius.gif) | 2.63 KB |
author: g_j_evans

comments.content:
Reminds me of Poolhouse from House Industries

[http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=14&subpage=viewfonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20051126074615/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=14&subpage=viewfonts)
Not exactly the same. Anyone else know?

‘ [JamboTango](http://web.archive.org/web/20051126074615/http:/www.dafont.com/en/font.php?file=jambotango&nb_ppp=50&text=igenius)’ _and_ ‘ [Dont Blurry](http://web.archive.org/web/20051126074615/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/tolstrup-pryds/tpgdont-blurry/)’ _are close as well_, _but still_, _no ‘perfect’ match_..  
_( An inspiration for all these may or may not have been ‘Blur’, by [Neville Brody](http://web.archive.org/wiki/Neville%20Brody).. )_

Dav, [formlos](http://web.archive.org/web/20051126074615/http:/www.formlos.net/)
